title: My free champion rotation doesn't change until the next day
body: Every week the champion rotation is supposed to change, but for me and my friend we have to wait until Tuesday and it's usually Monday the new champion rotation comes.

replies.body:
My rotation hasn't changed since I started the game, and that was at leat two weeks ago.
I am level ten but I didn't have internet for a week. Maybe that's the problem???

As it turns out, the weekly rotating champions can change on different days depending on the week. Most of the time we'll try to change the weekly champions around the same time that new content or patches come out. 

You can always check up on the weekly rotating champions on our [**Free Rotation**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/free-rotation) news page.

But, if the new list is posted on monday morning, should it be available then or could it just be held for hours or a day?
Usually I've seen them change on morning PST, but today the new list was posted in the morning and it's 9 pm PST already and I still see last weeks' free champions on the client and champ select.

We try to post the the weekly champion rotations ahead of time so that people can plan who they want to use that week. The new champion rotation typically happens around the same time new patches come out!

Ok, thanks for the reply.
And what time is that? The list is posted monday morning and the champion rotations is expected to change when?
